articles.author: Alexander Bolton
articles.title: McConnell invokes his wife’s name to slam Trump’s controversial immigrant remarks - The Hill
articles.description: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-Ky.) on Tuesday slapped down former President Trump’s statement that immigrants are “poisoning the blood of our country” by pointing out Trump appointed his wife, Elaine Chao, who is Taiwanese American, to serve as se…
